title: SOLD: T202 Lord/Tannehill, Shoeless Joe Jackson sliding center panel...
author: seablaster

posts.post_title: SOLD: T202 Lord/Tannehill, Shoeless Joe Jackson sliding center panel...
posts.post_content:
For sale here is a T202 Lord/Tannehill "Lord Catches His Man" and the man is none other than Shoeless Joe Jackson himself.

The card is $SOLD, net to me, postpaid in the continental U.S.  The card is a little rough with some paper loss on the reverse, but playing era cards of Joe Jackson are exceedingly rare...and expensive.  Just sayin'.

Commitment to purchase supercedes any ongoing negotiation. :rolleyes:
